moves.1. f4 d5: some time i attempt a c4 gambit on this which is more risky,  but this time i have been loosing a first blitz whith my oponent and i whanted to save the honor, so : NO RISK PLEASE !
moves.2. d4 Bg4: hum, ... this is embarasing for white
moves.3. h3 Bf5 4. e3 Nf6 5. Nc3:
i still asking my self how the best way to defend this e4 weak place.
somebody can help ?
moves.5... Ne4 6. Nxe4 Bxe4: that was sure ! so now i'm getting in troubles ...
moves.7. Bd3: MISTAKE ! i hope i'll rember for next time
moves.7... Bxg2 8. Rh2: so now my beautifull bird is out ! i'm furious whith me ! sorry for expose such a bad game, but after it will become interesting instead of those first bullshits
moves.8... Be4 9. Bxe4 dxe4:
what a disaster, my kingside looks like a desert, 
BUT : the center is strong and the oponent game undeveloped, so maybe i still have a chance
one thing is sure, I HAVE TO CASTLE TO THE QUEEN SIDE QUICKLY !!!
moves.10... e6:
i was so in a hurry that i didn't anticipate this Qh4
maybe i could move fist h3 h4 ? but i had loose a tempo to castle,so ...to be or not to be ?
moves.11. Bd2 Qh4+ 12. Rf2: ...but anyway this queen is not such a big problem
moves.12... Bd6: why this ? if somebody understand it please help me to understand !
moves.13. O-O-O:
OUF, HERE WE ARE ! the bird has flown to the queen side ! 
an now i supose the black will do the same, because otherwise i will have my 2 rooks, my queen my black bishop and a knight to attack him ...
moves.14. Be1:
preparing dicovered attack to the queen. The plan was this : 
Rg2 ... in the perspective to Rxg7
moves.14... Qe7 15. Rg2: maybe this move influence black to castle in king side ? ha ha ha !
moves.15... O-O: tactical error : i will soon have 2 rooks to attack this little castle !
moves.16. h4: let's begin whith my little but so dangerous pawn !
moves.16... f5:
i m not sure this whould be the better black move in this case, 
no matter for me, i go on advancing
moves.17. h5 Rf6: ho ho, it's becoming dangerous for black...
moves.20... Rh6 21. Rdg1: if i where black, I whould put my queen in h4, don't you ?

gameName: The bird has flown...to the other side !
